title: Weight Watchers Asian Marinated Asparagus recipe
directions: Snap off the tough ends of the asparagus.
Place the asparagus spears and 2 tablespoons water in a shallow microwave dish.
Cover and microwave at high for about 2-4 minutes (or until the asparagus is crisp-tender).
Drain the asparagus, return to the dish.
In a small bowl, combine the vinegar, soy sauce, sesame oil and gingerroot; stir with a whisk until the mixture is blended.
Pour the vinegar mixture over the asparagus, turning the asparagus to coat.
Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours, turning the asparagus occasionally.
